humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there is metastases in 1 out of 12 lymph nodes in the current specimen (1/12), metastases in 2 out of 5 sentinel lymph nodes (2/5), and a total of 3 out of 17 lymph nodes involved by metastatic carcinoma (3/17). According to the new rules provided, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has one of ten axillary lymph nodes involved by metastatic carcinoma (1/10) as per the pathology report. This corresponds to N1 stage according to the AJCC 7th edition TNM staging system for breast cancer.
